sentences.en: This keypad will send a message to your lamp.
sentences.cn: 你可以通过按键来给灯具发送一条信息。

sentences.en: By default, the host keypad is displayed as a drop-down list.
sentences.cn: 默认条件下，主机按键是作为下拉列表显示的。

sentences.en: Finding the keypad on your cellphone or music player a bit cramped?
sentences.cn: 是不是经常会发现你的手机或音乐播放器的键盘太小太拥挤？
